title: Kids and feeders in silver
body: Look I really want gold by the end of the season to get victorious sivir. I main ADC and I DO NOT WANT TO MISS THIS OUT. I've been trying to climb desperately but I keep getting matched up with feeders, especially in my promotional series. I just had one yesterday and it annoyed the hell out of me. I'm silver 3 right now (promos for silver 2)  and i swear I keep getting unranked players on my team. I had a riven on 80cs in 25 minute. What's even worse is that I get unranked players and I go up against gold 5s and 4s that destroy my other lanes. Silver 3 is the real elo hell.

replies.body: Yo you're in the wrong mindset. Laugh at your mistakes and other peoples. Just laugh.. You can't win them all and you can't lose them all. Just learn bro. I started silver 3 like a month or 2 ago and I'm at silver 1... You can climb. Just change your mind set. Learn.. Get some coaching if you think you're ready to learn.
The fact that I get unranked players on.my team and I vs all the gold players is unfair.

It's really not. The system says that that person deserves to be exactly next to you on your team. There's always a team destined to lose and a team destined to win. Be on the team destined to win and the rank won't matter cause they'll deserve to be on the team with you.
How do I be on the team destined to win?

to get victorious sivir just go to a program like paint and draw her :)
then u can copy that animation and put it onto your LoL champion.

If you want to get to gold, change your mindset. Stop worrying about the games where your teammates are so heavily outclassed there is no way to carry. There will be just as many games where your teammates are so much better and you can't lose. The games you need to worry about carrying are the close ones, where YOU are what makes the difference between winning and losing. Even if these are only one in 5 or 10 games, you can easily get a 55-60% winrate if you carry all the close ones and you will climb pretty damn fast.
How do u carry a mid later that doesn't even contribute into fights. He just feeds and feeds. It's so annoying
You clearly didn't read my post. You don't carry that game. You don't need to win every game to climb

Hey if you fail this year you always have next year.
P.S. just duo with a friend that way 1 less troll and when I duo with friends we normally don't have trolls
THERE IS NO VICTORIOUS SIVIR NEXT YEAR!!!
Jeez, calm down it's just a skin. It doesn't provide any bonuses only makes the champion look different.

I feel ya, i get paired up with feeders most games. The worst part is most of them actually don't have a brain....so they go 2v1 when they have 400 hp etc, never help in team fights, cleary cant play the easy champs like ashe etc. The list goes on
